TopicTitle: PS4 moving Maneuver Node locking up

Articles.Content:
Hello, new member here.

When manipulating a maneuver node, I can initially move the node around the orbit without issue.

After a few other adjustments (in pro or retrograde, or radial), the move node control seems to not function.

I can see the lines of the adjustment node being pulled in or out when use the L controller, but the node no longer moves around the orbit.

I end up deleted the maneuver and re-creating with the node in a different location on my orbit.

Any help would be appreciated.
